title: China launches Belt and Road foothold in Latin America
summary: State-owned enterprises announce first wave of infrastructure loans in the region.
impact: Establishes long-term financing leverage across critical logistics nodes.

title: Ecuador signs $7.5B hydroelectric package
summary: Conditioned loans secure downstream oil shipments to Chinese refineries.
impact: Demonstrates how debt leverage drives policy concessions.

title: Próspera breaks ground on Roatán
summary: A public-private governance partnership begins constructing the first Strategic Economic Zone aligned with U.S. standards.
impact: Shows alternative model for transparent, rules-based development.

title: Dominican Republic flips recognition to Beijing
summary: A package of telecom and infrastructure deals follows the diplomatic shift.
impact: Launches a new wave of PRC influence in the Caribbean basin.

title: Paraguay reaffirms ties with Taiwan
summary: Despite intense pressure, Paraguay remains the last South American democracy aligned with Taipei.
impact: Underscores urgency for U.S. economic engagement tools like TPRI.

title: TPRI legislation introduced in Congress
summary: Bipartisan sponsors unveil framework pairing TPRI with certified Strategic Economic Zones.
impact: Creates pathway for mobilizing private capital at scale.
